The dragon pickaxe (or) is a dragon pickaxe with a Zalcano shard added onto it, mimicking its old appearance from RuneScape 2 in 2009.

The shard gives no additional bonuses, and is only used to add aesthetics to the pickaxe. It costs 5,262,530 for both the parts to make the dragon pickaxe (or).

While the pickaxe is untradeable in its ornamented state, it can be reverted anytime, returning the dragon pickaxe and Zalcano shard.

[[File:Dragon pickaxe (or) detail.png|left|150px]]
The '''dragon pickaxe (or)''' is a [[dragon pickaxe]] with a [[Zalcano shard]] added onto it, mimicking its old appearance from ''RuneScape 2'' in 2009.

The shard gives no additional bonuses, and is only used to add aesthetics to the pickaxe. It costs {{Coins|{{GEP|Dragon pickaxe}}+{{GEP|Zalcano shard}}}} for both the parts to make the dragon pickaxe (or).

While the pickaxe is untradeable in its ornamented state, it can be reverted anytime, returning the dragon pickaxe and Zalcano shard.
